issue.title: [CF 134] New error with Meta Icons
issue.body:
IMPORTANT: Attaching a saved variables file/screenshot will increase the likelihood of your problem being solved.
Saved variables can be found in: "World of Warcraft/WTF/Account/<Account Name>/SavedVariables/TellMeWhen. lua"

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Create an icon that checks for missing buffs/debuffs
2. Create a Meta Icon that checks for that icon
3.

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
I get an error message

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
TellMeWhen 4 Beta 5

Do you have an error log of what happened?
Message: Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:1396: attempt to compare number with nil
Time: 03/05/11 20:10:48
Count: 398
Stack: Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:1396: in function <Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:1393>
Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:2349: in function <Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:2335>

Locals: cd = TellMeWhen_Group1_Icon1Cooldown {
0 = <userdata>
noCooldownCount = false
}
startTime = nil
duration = nil
(*temporary) = nil
(*temporary) = nil
(*temporary) = nil
(*temporary) = nil
(*temporary) = "attempt to compare number with nil"

Please provide any additional information below.
Error count continues to grow while Meta Icon active


> Posted by CurseForge user Beruchan | Imported from CurseForge issue #134 | Raw

comments.body:
Should be fixed in the next beta release. Thanks!


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
